mapper.select: select d.device_id, d.device_name, d.product_name, d.product_id,d.serial_number, d.status,d.things_model_value ,d.img_url,d.belong_family_id,d.belong_room_id,d.is_family_usual,d.family_gw_device_id,d.device_model_type ,ifnull(r.name,'未分配') as belong_room_name,ifnull(s1.is_disabled,0) as is_disabled from iot_device d left join iot_room r on d.belong_room_id = r.room_id left join (select * from msg_notice_setting s where s.user_id = #{settingUserId} and s.identifier = #{identifier}) as s1 on d.device_id = s1.bus_id where d.belong_family_id = #{belongFamilyId} order by d.create_time desc
where device_id = #{deviceId}
